settings.hero_subtitle: Instant digital download • 65 printable + fillable CBT tools

settings.bullet_text: Step-by-step prompts for cognitive restructuring and behavioral activation
Printable PDF + fillable digital files that are ready for session or homework
Covers psychoeducation, skills practice, and progress tracking

settings.item_text: Automatic thought records, ABC worksheets, and core belief maps
Behavioral activation calendars, activity experiments, and routine builders
Emotion regulation trackers, distress tolerance scripts, and coping cards
Exposure hierarchy planners, fear ladder worksheets, and safety plan templates
Values, goals, and relapse-prevention roadmaps for long-term follow up
Motivate change|Each worksheet translates CBT theory into concrete prompts clients can complete in-session or independently.
Practice new behaviors|Behavioral rehearsal, experiments, and daily routine trackers keep momentum going between appointments.
Regulate emotion|Grounding tools, rating scales, and check-ins build self-awareness and help clients monitor triggers.
Save planning time|Ready-to-print PDFs mean you can spend sessions coaching, not formatting homework.
Individual therapists guiding CBT-focused treatment plans
Group practices and IOP/PHP teams that need consistent handouts
Coaches and educators teaching CBT skills workshops
Clients who prefer structured self-help assignments and trackers
